item.title: The Blue Blood VIP Party Series by The Monarchy will debut on March 1st
item.description: Source: The Monarchy. A look at the interior. Kicking off today, The Monarchy: Blue Blood VIP Party Series welcomes renowned Australian DJ Scott Pullen at 10 pm. This new series at Singapore’s The Monarchy promises to extend the classic British cocktail bar experience into the late evening with its exclusive Blue Blood parties. Pullen, celebrated for electrifying crowds at iconic venues like New York’s Cielo and London’s Trade, brings his global expertise to the decks.
